description: Warmth should be one benefit of your bottoms, not the only. This pant comes with a tally of functionality-forward features for when you need a place to carry keys on a walk to the dog park or fuel to stay recharged on cross-country tours and hikes, while keeping it incognito as a streamlined, modern style you'll wear daily. Using a unique belt system, the first of its kind, its strap is concealed within the softshell at the waist, so you can achieve your best fit without bulk or snagging: a clean and conducive design for layering and lifetime play.
name: Mountain Hardwear Chockstone Warm Pants, Reg - Mens
